recipesJson.name: Banana Milkshake Remake
recipesJson.author: Kelgar78
recipesJson.description: Hey all!. This is a remix of banana milkshake i have done few months back. I decided to do it with less concentrates from the first attempt and i think the result is very good. So get your flavors and mix it. I hope you enjoy it! Cheers

reviews.text: Awesome recipe! Tastes just like a banana milkshake. I never mixed up the first version, but this spot on banana milkshake. Thanks for sharing.
